statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_type ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type != 'complaint' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE id = 5 OR id = 7 OR id = 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%satisfied%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT ticket_date, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, ticket_date, issue_description FROM customers JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id WHERE ticket_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets, customer_name FROM customers JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, product_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM customers JOIN inquiries ON customers.customer_id = inquiries.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, support_date FROM customers RIGHT JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_date, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
